title: Poker Face
lyrics:
[intro]
(Am)  (F) Mum-mum-mum-mah
(C)  (G) Mum-mum-mum-mah
 
(Am) I wanna hold 'em like they (F)do in Texas, please
(C)Fold 'em, let 'em, hit me, raise it, (G)baby, stay with me (I love it)
(Am)Love game intuition play the (F)cards with Spades to start
And (C)after he's been hooked I'll play the (G)one that's on his heart
 
(Am)Oh, oh, oh, oh, (F)ohhhh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(C) I'll get him hot, show (G)him what I've got
(Am)Oh, oh, oh, oh, (F)ohhhh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(C) I'll get him hot, show (G)him what I've got
 
[chorus]
(Am) Can't read my... can't read my
(F) No he can't read my (C)poker face
((G)She's got me like nobody)
(Am) Can't read my... can't read my
(F) No he can't read my (C)poker face
((G)She's got me like nobody)
 
(Am) P-p-p-poker face, p-(F)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-mah)
(C) P-p-p-poker face, p-(G)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-mah)
 
(Am) I wanna roll with him a (F)hard pair we will be
(C) A little gambling is (G)fun when you're with me (I love it)
(Am) Russian Roulette is not the (F)same without a gun
And (C)baby when it's love if its not (G)rough it isn't fun, fun
 
(Am)Oh, oh, oh, oh, (F)ohhhh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(C) I'll get him hot, show (G)him what I've got
(Am)Oh, oh, oh, oh, (F)ohhhh, oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
(C) I'll get him hot, show (G)him what I've got
 
[chorus]
(Am) Can't read my... can't read my
(F) No he can't read my (C)poker face
((G)She's got me like nobody)
(Am) Can't read my... can't read my
(F) No he can't read my (C)poker face
((G)She's got me like nobody)
 
(Am) P-p-p-poker face, p-(F)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-mah)
(C) P-p-p-poker face, p-(G)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-mah)
(Am) P-p-p-poker face, p-(F)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-mah)
(C) P-p-p-poker face, p-(G)p-poker face (mum-mum-mum-(Am)mah) [end]
